name: eManager Auto-Update File
summary: Learn about .XEV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: X-Genics eManager is a content management suite (CMS) from which businesses can monitor and report on business procedures, quality metrics, and regulatory compliance. Periodically, eManager receives automatic updates in the form of XEV files.

description: An XEV file is an update file used by X-Genics eManager. It contains an automatically-downloaded software update or a set of new eManager procedures.

instructions: XEV files are not meant to be opened. For instructions on how to use XEV files with X-Genics eManager, refer to the program's documentation.
